title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your intuition and rational precision work together in harmony today. However, it might take some wrangling on your part to get the two on the same page. For instance, if you experience a flash of insight about a current dilemma, be patient as your hands and mind follow up to align everything. But all the pieces wont likely fit as you discover that youre adding more to the overall equation than you need. Fortunately, you can trim off whats not effective or efficient now without losing whats essential. Honesty and discernment are powerful weapons for success. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
